instruction: Take the given inputs and generate a creative story.
input:
Topic: Family Reunion
Characters: Sarah, Emily, John
output: Sarah, Emily, and John had been anxiously awaiting the upcoming family reunion for weeks. They were excited to see all of their extended family members, some of whom they hadn’t seen in years. When the day finally arrived, the siblings were overwhelmed by the sight of their long-lost relatives. Everyone embraced in joyous hugs and shared stories of what had happened over the years. There were nostalgic conversations about the old days, and plenty of laughter. The reunion reminded the siblings of the importance of family, and they left feeling closer to each other than ever before.
